metadata.title: CVE-2018-19802 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
aubio v0.4.0 to v0.4.8 has a new_aubio_onset NULL pointer dereference.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-19802` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

aubio-tools - 0.4.9-2
libaubio5 - 0.4.9-2
python3-aubio - 0.4.9-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: aubio package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.4.9-2').
